overview: In Foreskin Follies, a new male strip joint holds an open cattle call for dancers, and the local exhibitionists race to line up and get paid (for a change) to be naked in public! First, dance coordinator, Lorenc Veno tops aspiring stripper Karlo Novicky in exchange for a chance to dance. Then, day manager Dino Slavek tops hopeful Romi Vondra who likes his music funky and whose trunk is junky! Next, dish-washer-by-night Roland Radek tops his dish-dryer Rosta Bartos as a part of their stab at fame, and finally, it's opening night and, not controversially, the club hires dance-impaired Peter Horny to top dance-challenged Jiri Sovak!
title: Foreskin Follies
